content:
Summary

CS Standard Alignment Guides are tools that help explain each CS standard from K-8th grade. This set in particular focuses on how specific 7th grade computer science standards can fit with hard and difficult history topics.

This material is based upon work supported by the National Science Foundation under Grant No. 2010256. Any opinions, findings, and conclusions or recommendations expressed in this material are those of the author(s) and do not necessarily reflect the views of the National Science Foundation.

frontmatter.title: Grade 8 Hard History Alignment Guide
frontmatter.authors: Valerie Fawley, Jess Newsome, Teresa Gaglio

parents.title: 6-8 Hard History Standard Alignment Guides
parents.authors: Valerie Fawley, Jess Newsome, Teresa Gaglio

parents.title: CS for Social Studies Lessons
